actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that the incentive payments presently authorized for the enforcement and collection of support rights assigned to a State shall be payable where that State enforces such rights through its own officers and agencies as well as where a political subdivision, or another State, enforces such rights on its behalf.

summary.text: Provides that the incentive payments presently authorized under title IV of the Social Security Act (Grants to States for Aid to Needy Families with Children) for the enforcement and collection of support rights assigned to a State shall be payable where that State enforces such rights through its own officers and agencies as well as where a political subdivision, or another State, enforces such rights on its behalf.

titles.title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that the incentive payments presently authorized for the enforcement and collection of support rights assigned to a State shall be payable where that State enforces such rights through its own officers and agencies as well as where a political subdivision, or another State, enforces such rights on its behalf.
